#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <limits.h>
#define ciu c-testcoin[c1].weight
using namespace std;
struct coins{
       int weight,value;
   };
bool byweight(coins a,coins b){
if (a.weight<b.weight)return 1;
else return 0;
}
int main()
{
   int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   for (;t>0;t--){
   int e,f;
   scanf("%d%d",&e,&f);
   int capacity(f-e);
   int q;
scanf("%d",&q);
   coins testcoin[q+1];
   for (int c(1);c<=q;c++){
    scanf("%d%d",&testcoin[c].value,&testcoin[c].weight);
   }
   // sort (testcoin,testcoin+q+1,byweight);
   int dp[capacity+1];
   dp[0]=0;
   for (int c(1);c<=capacity;c++){
    int k(INT_MAX);
    for (int c1(1);c1<=q;c1++){

        if (ciu>=0)if (dp[ciu]>=0&&k>dp[ciu]+testcoin[c1].value)k=dp[ciu]+testcoin[c1].value;
    }
    if (k==INT_MAX)dp[c]=-1;
else dp[c]=k;
   }
 if (dp[capacity]==-1)printf("This is impossible.\n");
 else printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n",dp[capacity]);

   }
    return 0;
}
